results.title: Baby girl
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling and Chrissy Ponting
results.brief_description: Life is very challenging for Chrissy as a teenage mum but through her love for daughter Lakeisha combined with the support of family and friends, she has been able to complete her school studies and begin training as a nurse. This is dedicated to her baby girl.
results.description: Life is very challenging for Chrissy as a teenage mum but through her love for daughter Lakeisha combined with the support of family and friends, she has been able to complete her school studies and begin training as a nurse. This is dedicated to her baby girl.
description_for_label: Life is very challenging for Chrissy as a teenage mum but through her love for daughter Lakeisha combined with the support of family and friends, she has been able to complete her school studies and begin training as a nurse. This is dedicated to her baby girl.

results.title: Vicki's story
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling and Vicki Atkinson
results.brief_description: Vicki reminisces about her family and childhood and how she looked up to her parents as role models hoping that what she has learned from them can be passed on to her own two daughters. This is her message.
results.description: Vicki reminisces about her family and childhood and how she looked up to her parents as role models hoping that what she has learned from them can be passed on to her own two daughters. This is her message.

results.title: Where is my story?
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling and Julian Silverman
results.brief_description: Julian reflects on the past and the untold stories of the Holocaust’s devastating impact on his family. Uses b&w archival footage of WWII and post WWII.

results.title: What's the name of that place you come from nan?
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling and Rita Hinekauia Morrison
results.brief_description: Rita comes from a mixed cultural background but her strongest connection is with the Maori side of her family. She shares her memories and family history in this digital story so that her Maori heritage can be preserved through future generations.
results.title_for_label: What’s the name of that place you come from nan?
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling and Rita Hinekauia Morrison
results.description: Rita comes from a mixed cultural background but her strongest connection is with the Maori side of her family. She shares her memories and family history in this digital story so that her Maori heritage can be preserved through future generations.

results.title: How much you mean to me nan
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling and Chris Mansfield
results.brief_description: She is always there when things get rough, she is the backbone of our mob, she is my nan…and I will love her always. A dedication by Chris to his nan.
results.title_for_label: How much you mean to me nan

results.title: ASHE: the way of life
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling and Colin Colger
results.brief_description: After the death of his mother and losing his way to a life of crime, Colin, a sports loving Shepparton boy, was offered a new beginning - a lifeline - through ASHE (Academy of Health Sports and Education).
results.description: After the death of his mother and losing his way to a life of crime, Colin, a sports loving Shepparton boy, was offered a new beginning - a lifeline - through ASHE (Academy of Health Sports and Education).

results.title: Jim Serafim goes to School
results.creator_credit: David Roberts, Jan Sharp and Film Australia
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Our multicultural society”.
A Greek child’s first day at school. Demonstrates the difficulties non-English speaking children and their parents have in their “new” country.
